gaps.title: Missing docstrings in core modules
gaps.description: Several core modules lack comprehensive module-level and function-level docstrings, reducing code maintainability and developer onboarding efficiency.

metadata.suggested_action: Add comprehensive docstrings following Google style guide

gaps.title: No unit tests for new ACMS modules
gaps.description: The four new ACMS modules (gap_registry, execution_planner, phase_plan_compiler, acms_controller) have no unit test coverage, creating risk for regressions.

metadata.impact: High - no safety net for changes
metadata.suggested_action: Create pytest test suite with >80% coverage

gaps.title: AI integration placeholders not implemented
gaps.description: Phase 1 gap analysis and Phase 3 plan generation use placeholder logic instead of actual AI integration, limiting real-world utility.

metadata.suggested_action: Implement AI service clients for gap analysis and plan generation

gaps.title: MINI_PIPE orchestrator integration incomplete
gaps.description: Phase 4 execution has placeholder logic instead of actual MINI_PIPE orchestrator invocation, preventing automated code changes.

gaps.title: Limited error handling in pipeline
gaps.description: ACMS controller has basic try/catch but lacks granular error handling for individual phase failures, retry logic, and graceful degradation.

metadata.suggested_action: Add per-phase error handling, retry policies, and partial success tracking

gaps.title: No configuration file support
gaps.description: ACMS controller uses hardcoded values for clustering parameters, file limits, and integration paths. No external configuration mechanism.

metadata.suggested_action: Add YAML/JSON config file support with sensible defaults

gaps.title: No input validation in gap registry
gaps.description: Gap registry load_from_report assumes well-formed JSON and doesn't validate gap records against schema, risking runtime errors.

metadata.suggested_action: Add JSON schema validation for gap reports

gaps.title: Clustering algorithm not optimized for large repos
gaps.description: Execution planner uses nested loops for file proximity clustering, with O(nÂ²) complexity. May be slow for repos with 1000+ gaps.

metadata.suggested_action: Optimize clustering with spatial indexing or graph algorithms

gaps.title: Insufficient logging for debugging
gaps.description: ACMS modules use print() instead of proper logging framework, making debugging and production monitoring difficult.

metadata.suggested_action: Replace print() with proper logging (logging module or structlog)

gaps.title: Limited CLI features
gaps.description: ACMS CLI lacks features like dry-run mode, verbose output control, resume capability, and listing existing runs.

gaps.title: No Git integration for safe execution
gaps.description: ACMS doesn't create Git branches or commits, violating the safety constraint from the spec that changes should not go directly to main branch.

metadata.suggested_action: Add Git branch creation in Phase 0, commit patches in Phase 5

gaps.title: Patch ledger integration not implemented
gaps.description: Phase 5 has placeholder for patch ledger but doesn't integrate MINI_PIPE_patch_converter and MINI_PIPE_patch_ledger.

metadata.suggested_action: Wire patch converter and ledger modules in Phase 5
